nodes.text: Fiddich, also known as Patchwork Fiddich, was a male pirate who served under Captains Carabba and Gunda Mabin as part of the Blazing Claws. He attempted to lead a mutiny against Mabin during her search for Maz Kanata's treasures but was killed by her quickfire. His corpse was mounted to a forward cannon of the Bloody Bones and disintegrated when the ship jumped to hyperspace.
